title: Manfrotto 498RC2 Ball Head with Quick Release Replaces Manfrotto 488RC2
description: Larger  size, light, with quick release - perfect for advanced amateurs and professionals. With its solid aluminum construction and phenolic resin ball, this head is the ideal support for all traditional or digital small or medium format cameras.  It has a single indexed "ratchet" locking knob for 360° pan and +90° -90° tilt movements. Equipped with a 200PL quick release camera plate system with a secondary safety catch.  Camera plate has 1/4" male thread.  Head to tripod attachment is 3/8" female thread.All aluminum construction and black finish.Technical Specs:Attachment (top)1/4" male threadAttachment (bottom)3/8" female threadIndependent Pan LockNoLateral Tilt+90°/-90° head tiltMaterialAluminumPanoramic Rotation360°Plate Type200PLLoad Capacity8kg • 17.64 lbsWeight0.61 kg • 1.34 lbsWorking Height12.5 cm • 4.92 in
